mapper.select: SELECT r.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID AS replyId, r.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent, l.LAWYER_ID, l.LAWYER_NAME, l.LAWYER_COMPANY, l.LAWYER_IMAGE, r.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, r.CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE c LEFT JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY r ON c.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = r.CONSULTING_CASE_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_LAWYER l ON r.LAWYER_ID = l.LAWYER_ID WHERE c.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = #{consultId}

SELECT COUNT(r.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID) AS replyCount FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE c LEFT JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY r ON c.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = r.CONSULTING_CASE_ID WHERE c.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = #{consultId} GROUP BY c.CONSULTING_CASE_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, CC.CASE_TITLE, CC.CASE_CONTENT, CC.MEMBER_ID, CC.CREATE_DATE AS CONSULT_CREATE_DATE, CCR.LAWYER_ID, L.LAWYER_NAME, L.LAWYER_IMAGE, CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID AS REPLY_ID, CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT AS REPLY_CONTENT, CC.CASE_COUNT, CCR.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR1 WHERE CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID ) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE CC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID, CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT, CCR1.LAWYER_ID, CCR1.CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR1 WHERE CCR1.CREATE_DATE = ( SELECT MIN(CREATE_DATE) FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR2 WHERE CCR2.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID ) ) CCR ON CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_LAWYER L ON CCR.LAWYER_ID = L.LAWYER_ID ORDER BY CONSULT_CREATE_DATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM<= 3

SELECT F.FIELD_TITLE, SC.SOLUTION_CASE_TITLE FROM TBL_FIELD F LEFT JOIN TBL_SOLUTION_CASE SC ON F.FIELD_ID = SC.LAWYER_ID
WHERE ROWNUM <=3
